description: Verify that the About page loads correctly when accessing the /about URL
scenario: User navigates to the About page to learn about Phalanx Cyber Academy mission and team
expected_results: Display the complete About page with header section, mission content, learning philosophy, team members, and features showcase
procedure:
1. Open web browser
2. Navigate to http://localhost:5000/about
3. Verify page loads completely
4. Check page title displays 'About'
5. Verify all main sections are visible and properly formatted

description: Verify the About page is responsive across different screen sizes
scenario: User views the About page on mobile, tablet, and desktop devices
expected_results: Page layout adapts properly to different screen sizes with readable content and functional elements
procedure:
1. Navigate to /about page on desktop (1920x1080)
2. Verify all sections display in proper grid layout
3. Resize browser to tablet size (768px width)
4. Check grid layouts adjust appropriately
5. Resize to mobile size (375px width)
6. Verify single column layout on mobile
7. Check all text remains readable
8. Test touch interactions on mobile
9. Verify navigation and buttons work on all sizes

description: Verify that external CSS and JavaScript files load correctly
scenario: User accesses the About page and all styling and interactive elements function
expected_results: about.css and about.js files load successfully, animations work, and styling is applied
procedure:
1. Open browser developer tools
2. Navigate to /about page
3. Check Network tab for successful loading of about.css
4. Verify about.js loads without errors
5. Check Console tab for any JavaScript errors
6. Verify fade-in animations work properly
7. Test hover effects and transitions
8. Check all CSS styling is applied correctly
9. Verify cyber-glow effects are visible

description: Verify the Mission section displays content and Get Involved button functionality
scenario: User reads the mission statement and clicks on Get Involved button
expected_results: Display mission heading, descriptive text, and functional Get Involved button that links to contact page
procedure:
1. Navigate to /about page
2. Scroll to Mission section
3. Verify 'Our Mission' heading is displayed
4. Check mission description text is visible and readable
5. Verify 'Get Involved' button is present
6. Click 'Get Involved' button
7. Verify it redirects to contact page

description: Verify that navigation to and from the About page works correctly
scenario: User navigates to About page from different parts of the site and uses navigation menu
expected_results: About page is accessible from main navigation and users can navigate away successfully
procedure:
1. Navigate to home page (/)
2. Click About link in main navigation
3. Verify About page loads correctly
4. Check browser URL shows /about
5. Use browser back button to return to previous page
6. Navigate directly to /about URL
7. Test navigation menu links from About page
8. Verify breadcrumb navigation if present
9. Test deep linking to /about page
